Stan Models
===============================

version number: 0.0.1
author: Jacki Novik

Overview
--------

Library of Stan Models for Computational Biology

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install stanmodels


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/jburos/stanmodels.git
    $ python setup.py install
